sys_ux_client_script.name: Search result clicked

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_67788f5c28e20210644edd7f481c24cf
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">eb788f5c37e20210ba49b59edb6ac2d8</macroponent><name>Search result clicked</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const ACTION_NAME = event.payload.action.actionDispatch;
    var route = 'landing';
    if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION_CATALOG_KB_ARTICLE' || ACTION_NAME == 'GENIUS_NAVIGATION_CATALOG_KB_ARTICLE') {
        route = "article";
        const fields = {
            "sysId": event.payload.action.actionPayload.sysId
        };
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION' && event.payload.action.actionPayload.url !== "") {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            external: {
                "url": event.payload.action.actionPayload.url
            }
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION') {
        var table = event.payload.action.actionPayload.table;
        if (table == "kb_knowledge") {
            route = "article";
        } else if (table == "sc_cat_item" && event.payload.action.actionPayload.url == "") {
            route = "catalog";
        }
        const fields = {
            "sysId": event.payload.action.actionPayload.sysId
        };
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'GENIUS_NAVIGATION_CATALOG_EXTERNAL') {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            external: {
                "url": event.payload.action.actionPayload.url
            }
        });
    } else return;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 20:19:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>67788f5c28e20210644edd7f481c24cf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Search result clicked</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_67788f5c28e20210644edd7f481c24cf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 20:19:10</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
